name: Roller Riches
description:
Roller Riches (Ludum Dare 47 Entry)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/roller-riches

Changelog (v3)

- Added audio - if judging for Ludum Dare 47, please disable!!!

- Minor progress bar visual bug fix

- Numbers should no longer overflow in regular gameplay

- Numbers will use scientific notation when they become large enough

Changelog (v2)

- Fixed scaling issues with certain displays

- Fixed minor background visuals glitch
